Class DirectedEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.Edge
      • graph.DirectedEdge

  • public class DirectedEdge
extends Edge
    Describe an edge connecting a source vertice and an end vertice
    Author:
    Gauchoux, Robilliard

    • Constructor Detail

      • DirectedEdge

        public DirectedEdge(Vertex vertexOrigin,
            Vertex vertexEnd)
        Make a directed edge with a source vertex and an end vertex
        Parameters:
        vertexSource - The source of the edge for DirectedEdge, can be both of vertices in case of UndirectedEdge
        vertexEnd - The end of the edge for DirectedEdge, can be both of vertices in case of UndirectedEdge
